snippet.textDisplay: You do such a great job of making sure to include the ethical and environmental sides of the engineering problem
snippet.textOriginal: You do such a great job of making sure to include the ethical and environmental sides of the engineering problem

snippet.textDisplay: And it's such an important side of the story as well. Engineering is all about applied science, and when considering application, everyone wants to know what's possible, but a lot of people (thankfully not the majority) don't consider legal/ethical consequences.
snippet.textOriginal: And it's such an important side of the story as well. Engineering is all about applied science, and when considering application, everyone wants to know what's possible, but a lot of people (thankfully not the majority) don't consider legal/ethical consequences.
